item.title: 84 - Largest Rectangle in Histogram
item.description: leetcode Problem Given n non-negative integers representing the histogram's bar height where the width of each bar is 1, find the area of largest rectangle in the histogram. Example: Input: [2,1,5,6,2,3] Output: 10 Above is a histogram where width of each bar is 1, given height = [2,1,5,6,2,3]. The largest rectangle is shown in the shaded area, which has area = 10 unit. Notes Main idea is to caculate both left edge and right edge for every entry in the array
